api.name: ObPopoverDirective
api.usage: This directive renders a template in a container that is inserted at the end of the body.

inputs.name: closeOnlyOnToggle
inputs.text: Indicate if this ObPopoverDirective should be closed only when clicking on the toggle element. If not set, it will act as if it were configured with false.

inputs.name: obPopover
inputs.text: The template to be rendered inside the popover.

inputs.name: placement
inputs.text: Defines the position of the popover relative to its toggle.

inputs.name: toggleHandle
inputs.text: Indicate which toggle this ObPopoverDirective should handle. If not set, it will act as if it were configured with click.

inputs.name: appendToBody
inputs.text: Controls where the popover is inserted in the DOM. `true` means it will be inserted at the end of the body. `false` means it will be inserted right after its toggle.

tokens.name: OBLIQUE_POPOVER_CLOSE_ONLY_ON_TOGGLE
tokens.text: The default value for closeOnlyOnToggle property that will be applied to all ObPopoverDirective throughout the application.

tokens.name: OBLIQUE_POPOVER_TOGGLE_HANDLE
tokens.text: The default value for toggleHandle property that will be applied to all ObPopoverDirective throughout the application.
